#summary sequence_seqc22
Fichtenholz: pagen 62

http://code.google.com/p/javahotel/source/browse/trunk/examples/sequence/sequences/seqc2.h

The limit is diverge for a<-3 and a>1, here is example -3.1

Launch sequence:
{{{
  SequenceCommand *com = createCommand(SEQC2,-3.1);

  SequenceEngine::runSequence(com,100);
}}}
